rallyHere.name: RallyHere
rallyHere.description:
• Frontend Lead for developer portal of white-labeled game management SaaS
  • Architected React/TypeScript/FastAPI system serving multiple dev teams
  • Created tooling to transform OpenAPI specs into UI component data maps
  • Implemented state management with React Query and Cloudflare caching

hiRez.name: Hi-Rez Studios
hiRez.description:
• Director of Web Development, managing cross-functional team of 12
  • Created reusable component libraries improving code quality and velocity
  • Transformed legacy infrastructure to modern React architecture
  • Implemented custom A/B testing framework with Google Analytics
  • Led initiative to streamline processes across 60-person publishing org
  • Managed AWS/Azure infrastructure with automated deployment

freelance.name: Consultant
freelance.description:
• Freelance Developer on large-scale projects for AT&T and Google
  • Project managed and developed complex interactive solutions
  • Led development of real-time exhibits for Google Partner Plex
  • Created technical specifications and development standards

frogDesign.name: frog Design
frogDesign.description:
• Senior Program Manager for American Express' SERVE payment platform
  • Led design and specification of developer sandbox environments
  • Created proposals, estimates, budgets, and functional specs
  • Bridged gap between design, technology, and business requirements

nyt.name: The New York Times
nyt.description:
• Interactive Production Manager in Creative Services
  • Managed development infrastructure across multiple platforms
  • Led technical implementations of consumer-facing digital products
  • Technical liaison between Creative Services and engineering teams

schematic.name: Schematic
schematic.description:
• Project Manager for NBC Olympics Silverlight Video Player
  • Established development standards for Reuters Innovation Center
  • Managed technical implementation of Panasonic Viera Cast interface
  • Created standardized process for technical documentation

previous.name: Previous Experience
previous.description:
• Roles at LBi, POKE NY, BEAM Interactive, and The Barbarian Group
  • Advanced from Associate Producer to Senior Project Manager
  • Managed diverse digital projects across multiple industries
  • BA in Economics from Tufts University (2004)
  • Certified Scrum Master (2008)
